Trigger A creature within 30 feet uses magic to summon or conjure a creature

Effect The dragon attempts a counteract check with a Hell Lore check (counteract rank equal to half the dragon's level, rounded up). On a success, the dragon seizes control of the effect, causing it to fail and immediately casting a summon fiend spell of the same rank (minimum 5th) as the triggering effect to summon a creature with the devil trait.
